definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized

sentences.english: According to the rules, there should be people especially assigned in a power network to save electrical power.
sentences.chinese: 按照规定，电力网应设有专责人员负责节电工作。

sentences.english: Is transfer of money and negotiable securities usually Made by armoured motor vehicle?
sentences.chinese: 金钱与流通证券之运送通常是否由专责运送机构为之？

sentences.english: The vice-principal provide effective guidance to the work of specialist departments.
sentences.chinese: 副校长有效地指导专责部门的工作。

sentences.english: Select on Rename and name your Recycle Bin to a new name.
sentences.chinese: 专责就更名和名称你的回收站提高到一个新的名字。

definition: to dispatch (sb) in an official capacity/to be posted (as an ambassador, foreign correspondent etc)
to set apart/to assign sb to a job
in charge (of a position etc)/the person in charge/responsible
to assign (a task to different people)/to allocate
special appointment/special correspondent/task force/sb dispatched on a mission
internal affairs/domestic affairs/family affairs/(trad.) affairs within the palace
